title: Ranjan back in court for defamation case
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former MP Ranjan Ramanayake was produced to the Negombo District Court on Friday (27).
This was related to a defamation case filed against him by Former State Minister Nimal Lanza.
At the same time, a silent protest took place opposite the Negombo Court Complex, demanding the release of Ranjan Ramanayake.
